name: B1 File
summary: Learn about .B1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use B1 Free Archiver (cross-platform) to open B1 files and extract their contents. To do so, open B1 Free Archiver, click the Open button, and navigate to and select your B1 file. Then, select the Extract button found in B1 Free Archiver's lower right-hand corner.
If you do not want to download and install B1 Free Archiver, you can use B1's free Online Archiver to open B1 files and extract their contents.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .b1 file in B1 Free Archiver
images.caption: B1 file open in B1 Free Archiver
